name: OopsieDaisy
description:
Grow your special plant and it will conquer the hearts of the people. A small farming simulator with a twist. 

This game was made at the Franken Game Jam 2020.

Features:

  • Cute Pixel Graphics
  • Farming and caring for your special plant
  • Second mode unlock when your plant is happy!

 Have fun playing!
